pr_title: Define async result success as not getting an exception

timeline.message: Define async result success as not getting an exception

timeline.bodyText:
Optionally, we could consider throwing a RuntimeException if both params are null (as this would be a bug and should never happen)
Edit: Lies!
timeline.author: iambmelt

replies.bodyText: Isn't this what we discussed yesterday and we concluded that we would allow both to be null as is the case for the getAccount(identifier) API? (it returns null without exception if an account for the identifier doesn't exist).
replies.author: shahzaibj
